name: Data Science
description: Comprehensive program covering the full data science pipeline using Python. It includes data preprocessing, EDA, statistics, machine learning algorithms, deep learning (CNN, RNN, GAN), NLP basics, data visualization (Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly, Tableau), and advanced frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch.

name: Data Science with Python
file: SimpliLearn Data Science with Python Certificate.pdf
description: Focused on Python’s application in data science. Covered data types, control flow, OOPs, statistical concepts, linear regression, clustering, and basic data visualization techniques.

name: PCAP: Certified Associate Python Programmer
description: Globally recognized certification validating foundational to intermediate Python programming knowledge including OOP, functions, exception handling, file I/O, modules, and basic GUI design using Tkinter.

name: HackerRank SQL (Intermediate)
description: Assessed intermediate SQL proficiency. Included writing complex queries, multi-table joins, nested queries, aggregations, constraints, and relational schema design.

name: Deep Learning
description: In-depth module on designing and training deep neural networks. Covered forward and backpropagation, CNNs, RNNs, LSTMs, GANs, autoencoders, and advanced model tuning with TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Keras.

name: Chat GPT Webinar
description: Participated in a live session exploring ChatGPT's architecture, prompt engineering techniques, use in automation and productivity, and ethical considerations.

name: Microsoft Excel
description: Training in core Excel operations including data handling, pivot tables, formulas, data cleaning, and integrating Python for automation and visualization tasks.

name: Data Science Capstone
description: Real-world capstone project using full-stack data science workflow. Included problem formulation, data acquisition, EDA, feature engineering, model building, and performance evaluation.

name: IBM Python
description: Introduction to Python programming from IBM. Covered variables, data types, control structures, OOPs, file operations, and Python libraries used in analytics and data visualization.

name: IBM deep Learning
description: Focused course on foundational deep learning principles, model development, optimization, and usage in real-world applications using IBM tools and frameworks.

name: Industry Master SimplilEarn
description: Summarizes completion of core modules across data science and industry-focused training, signifying readiness for practical, job-oriented roles.

name: SimpliLearn MySQL
description: Course covering MySQL fundamentals: schema design, CRUD operations, joins, indexing, normalization, and query optimization for relational databases.

name: Simplearn Certificates Data Scientist
description: Bundled certificate representing completion of multiple in-depth modules in data science, ML, Python, statistics, and visualization — aligned with real-world applications.

name: SimpliLearn Data Science with R
description: Applied data science training using R language. Topics included data manipulation, visualization with ggplot2, statistical inference, and machine learning models.

name: SimpliLearn ML
description: Covers core ML concepts: supervised and unsupervised algorithms, SVM, KNN, decision trees, random forests, model evaluation, and bias-variance tradeoff.

name: Maths Refresher
description: A refresher course on key mathematical concepts essential for ML and data science, including algebra, matrices, probability, and statistics.

name: Python for data sciences
file: SimpliLearn Python for data sciences Certificate.pdf
description: Focuses on using Python for data exploration, preprocessing, analysis, and basic model building in a data science context.

name: Statisitical Essentials
description: Provides a foundation in descriptive and inferential statistics, hypothesis testing, distributions, and statistical reasoning.

name: Tableau
description: Hands-on Tableau training covering dashboards, calculated fields, filters, charts, and visual storytelling to communicate insights.

name: SQL Basic
description: Validates foundational SQL knowledge including SELECT queries, filtering, ordering, and basic joins.
